alert.note: Alert for Bond; Clinton; Fayette; Marion; Washington (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 5:25PM CDT until July 29 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR CLINTON...BOND...MARION...SOUTHERN FAYETTE AND WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 524 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mulberry Grove to Wamac to near Du Quoin, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Centralia, Salem, Vandalia, Centralia, Sandoval, Wamac, Central City, Odin, Irvington, and Patoka around 530 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Kinmundy, Farina, Omega, Stephen Forbes Station and Helm. This also includes Carlyle Lake Recreational Area. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 36 and 68. Interstate 57 in Illinois between exits 109 and 135. Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 41 and 61. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
